Title: Relates to modifications, suspensions, revocations, and renewals of permits under the air quality control program
Summary: Enacts provisions relating to modifications, suspensions, revocations, and renewals under the air quality control program; provides for expiration of any permit which has no expiration and has been in effect for five years; provides renewal periods shall not be longer than five years.
LawCode: Amd ยง70-0115, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to permit modifications, suspensions, revocations, renewals, reissuances and recertifications under the air quality control program
